protocol.text: Col-0.24R3 (Col-0 at 24 hpi with A. brassicicola, biological rep 3) was removed from data processing because the data did not pass a QC based on affyPML of Bioconducter. The data from the remaining .CEL files were processed using gcrma of Bioconductor (v.2.32.0), using the default parameters. ID_REF =  VALUE = GC-RMA

10 ul droplet of the spore suspension was placed on adaxial side of each leaf. The inoculated plants were placed in relative humidity of 100% for the course of the experiment. Inoculation was performed at 10 am.

Arabidopsis plants were grown at 22ï¾°C with relative humidity of 75% with a 12h-light/12h-dark cycle (dawn at 8 am and dusk at 8 pm). The 3rd to 5th true leaves of 3-week old plants were used. The A. brassicicola strain ATCC96836 was grown on 1/2 x potato dextrose agar for 7 days before spores were suspended in water. The density of spore suspension was adjusted to 1xE5 spores/ml, based on the counting with a hemocytometer.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol.
Biotin Labelled cRNA using Affymetrix GeneChip Hybridization, Wash and Stain Kit, according to guidelines set out by Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA
Scanned according to guidelines set out by Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA.
